Breakfast on the Go

Breakfast on the Go
long_desc: Have a lot to do? Book our Breakfast on the Go Package and receive a $10.00 Pret A Manger card per person at our best available rates. This promotion applies to reservations made exclusively on our website and cannot be combined with any other discounts or promotions. Details: Valid for stays until August 31, 2017. One (1) $10 dollar Pret A Manger card per night single occupancy, two (2) $10 dollar Pret A Manger cards per night double occupancy. Maximum number of Pret A Manger cards per room per night, two (2) $10 cards based on double occupancy. Offer does not apply to groups of 5 or more rooms. Offer cannot be combined with any other discounts or promotions. Blackout dates may apply. Based upon availability.
short_desc: Book our Breakfast on the Go Package and receive a $10.00 Pret A Manger card per person at our best available rates
title: Breakfast on the Go
page_title: TriBeCa Hotel Deals | Cosmopolitan Hotel TriBeCa
meta_content: Make the most of your stay with one of our rewarding Tribeca hotel deals. Embrace easy business travel or a romantic date night with our downtown NYC hotel deals.
